abstract: Elizabeth C. Gorski hand-crafts another masterpiece.
snippet: Elizabeth C. Gorski hand-crafts another masterpiece.
lead_paragraph: Elizabeth C. Gorski is a consummate professional with her own distinct personal style. Crosswords carrying her byline often contain a visual element that adds an extra dimension to the solving experience. Sometimes there are circles in the grid to help us out, but her last three have given us no such guidance. The visual pattern emerges slowly as we work out the clues. (Tyler Hinman should replace “slowly” with “insanely quickly” in that previous sentence.)
